channel.title: Cloud Computings on
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Computings on

item.description: CloudFormation #aws #IaC #cloud A templating Language to write infrastructure configuration as code offered by AWS

Kinesis #aws #cloud #serverless #dataanalytics Family of services to collect, process and analyze streaming data in real-time by AWS. Streaming data is simply data continuously generated by many data sources sending a small amount of information simultaneously.
AWS SNS #aws #cloud #notification A simple service by AWS enabling users to send notifications via SMS, Push notifications, or email.

SQS #aws #cloud #serverless #microservices #decoupleing #queue First-ever AWS service that was made publicly available. (Oldest service). Message Queue service enables web services applications to queue messages.

AWS CLI #aws #cli A CLI tool by AWS to controll aws resources via command line. It requires user credentials to perform actions to the account in which the credentials are valid and authorized to perform equivalent console based actions.

Bastion #aws #ec2 #cloud #compute also known as Jump-box Bastions are Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 instances which are security harden. They are designed to help you gain access to your EC2 via SSH or RCP that are in private subnet which are not directly accessible from the internet.
EC2 Spot Instances #aws #compute #ec2 AWS Provides a cheaper alternative compute solution in Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 for non important tasks.

ECS (Elastic Container Service) #aws #cloud #containers Amazon ECS is a fully managed Container orchestration service by AWS that helps you easily deploy, manage, and scale containerized applications.
EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service) #aws #cloud #Kubernetes #managed-kubernetes-cluster Amazon EKS is a managed Kubernetes service to run Kubernetes in the AWS cloud and on-premises data centers.
EC2 #aws #cloud #compute The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud, is an AWS platform for providing cloud-based compute capacity. That means it provides virtual machines in the sky.

Elastic Load balancer (ELB) #aws #cloud #vpc #networking #loadbalancer Loadbalancer service provided by AWS Elastic Load Balancing supports the following types of load balancers: Application Load Balancers, Network Load Balancers, and Classic Load Balancers.

Lambda #aws #cloud #serverless #compute #development Run code without provisioning or managing servers in AWS. Lambda executes your code only when needed and scales automatically to a few to a 1000 lambda functions concurrently in seconds.
Security Groups #aws #cloud Defence In Depth Zero-Trust Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 RDS Elastic Load Balancer (ELB)

Windows Container Docker on AWS #docker #windows #aws To run windows containers in docker within AWS, launch an Elastic Compute Cloud EC2with an Windows_Server-2022-English-Core-ContainersLatest-2022.

Aurora #aws #cloud #rdbms #serverless #sql Fully managed Postgres or MySQL database by AWS. Combines the speed and availability of high end database with the simplicity and cost-effectiveness of opensource databases
DynamoDB #aws #cloud #databases #nosql Key value and document database (NoSQL) solution by AWS which can guarantee consistent read and write speed at any scale .

RDS #aws #cloud #sql #databases #rdbms A fully managed Relational Database Service by AWS A managed relational Database service which supports many RDMS engine which are easy to scale, maintain and update easily.
Redshift #aws #cloud #storage #datawarehousing It is a fully managed Petabase-sized solution for data ware housing by AWS. Redshift is singe AZ Snapshots can be resored at a different AZ
Snowball #aws #cloud #snowball #storage #cloud-migration Low Cost data transfer service by AWS (Petabyte Scale). Snowball can reduce the cost by 1/5th

Storage Gateway #aws #cloud #storage #networking A networking service by AWS which provides a seamless and secure integration between your organization’s on-premise IT environment and AWS’s storage infrastructure.
CloudTrail #aws #cloud #auditing #logs #monitoring Logs API calls between AWS services. when you need to know who to blame.
Cloudwatch #aws #cloud #monitoring #logs monitoring solution for all of the various AWS resources by AWS. Cloudwatch-Logs , store, and access your log files.

CloudFront #aws #cloud #edge #CDN A CDN service provided by AWS. A CDN is a distributed network of servers which delivers web pages and contents to users based on their geographical location, the origin of the webpage.
Route53 #aws #cloud #dns #networking A DNS solution by AWS. Route53 is a DNS similar to Godaddy or Namecheap. Use cases:

VPC (Virtual Private Cloud) #aws #cloud #vpc #networking Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is a commercial cloud computing service that provides users a virtual private cloud, by “provisioning a logically isolated section of AWS Cloud”.
Control Tower #aws #cloud Is an extention to aws organization, that lets you create a landing zone (a well-architected multi-account baseline)
Service Control Policies #aws #cloud Service control policies (SCPs) are a type of organization policy that you can use to manage permissions in your organization.

Amazon Cognito #aws #cloud #security Decentralised way of managing Authentication by AWS. Web Identity Federation and IpD Web Identity Federation To exchange identity and security information between an #Identity Provider IdP and application.
IAM #aws #cloud #security #rbac Identity based management solution by AWS IAM allows management of access of users and resources
KMS #cloud #aws #security AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) lets you create, manage, and control cryptographic keys across your applications and more than 100 AWS services.
WAF #aws #cloud AWS WAF is a web application firewall WAF that helps protect apps and APIs against bots and exploits that consume resources, skew metrics, or cause downtime.
EBS #cloud #aws #storage A device access block storage solution by AWS. Highly available and durable solution for attaching persistent block storage volumes to an Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 instance.
EFS #aws #cloud #storage #nfs Scalable, Elastic Cloud-native NFS file System offered by AWS. Acts as a single drive which could be utilized by multiple Elastic Compute Cloud EC2 instances.
S3 #aws #s3 #storage #serverless #cloud Object storage solution provided by AWS. Serverless storage in the cloud. Do not have to worry about the underlying infrastructure
Azure Active Directory (AAD) #Azure #Active-Directory #rbac Azure AD is not simply a cloud version of Active Directory in Azure as the name might suggest.
ACR (Azure Container Registry) #Azure #cloud #containers #registry #container-registry #docker It is a simple container registry service provided by Azure. It is similar to ECR Provided by AWS.
Azure App Service #azure #cloud #compute It is a cloud computing based platform for hosting websites in Azure, created and operated by Microsoft.

Azure Virtual Desktop #cloud #Azure #virtual-machines #compute Azure Virtual Desktop, (formerly known as Windows Virtual Desktop) is a Microsoft Azure-based system for virtualizing its Windows operating systems, aimed at enterprise customers rather than at individual users.
AZ 900 Cloud Concepts 15-25% Azure Core Services 30-35% Security 25-30% Pricing 20-25% 40-60 questions

Azure AD #azure #Active-Directory Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) is a directory service provided by Microsoft Azure that enables you to sign in and access both Microsoft cloud applications and cloud applications that you develop.
Azure DNS #Azure #cloud #networking This service is used to manage your DNS records and also host them. Similar to AWS Route53.
Azure Load Balancer #Azure #cloud Is used for evenly distributing incoming network traffic across a group of backend resources or servers using OSI Layer 4 (Transport Layer).
NACL (Network Access Control List) #Azure #cloud #security #acl
NSG (Network Security Groups) #Azure #cloud #security #security-groups An Azure networking firewall like service similar to AWS NSG.
Azure Traffic Manager #Azure #cloud #networking this services operates at the DNS layer to quickly and efficiently direct incoming DNS requests based on the routing method of your choice.
WAF #Azure #cloud #security #waf A cloud native WAF 1 Solution by Azure which protects web-apps from common cyber attacks. Azure WAF consists of and .
Azure Blob Storage #Azure #cloud #storage It is a object storage solution provided by Azure for cloud-native workloads, data archives, data lakes, etc.

Cosmos DB #cloud #Azure #databases Azure SQL Database is a high-performance, reliable, fully managed, and secure relational database based on the latest stable version of the Microsoft SQL Server database engine provided by Azure.

DP-900 Core Data related Azure Services Azure Storage Explorer (To explore Azure Storage accounts) Azure Synapse Analytics Azure Data Lake Storage Azure Data Analytics Azure Data Box Azure Databricks (Apache spark 3rd party) Microsoft Power BI (Dashboards) HDInsight (fully managed Hadoop) Azure Data Studio (IDE like VSCode for data related tasks similar to SSIS) Azure Data Factory (ETL/ELT pipeline builder) SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) Azure Data Roles Data Engineer Tools Data Overview Data Basically Information
Cheet Sheets Power BI Data Cheetsheets Relational Databases Account Storage CosmosDB Azure Synapse and Data Lake Hadoop Spark and DataBricks SQL Management Studio (SSMS) Database Security
Resource Groups (Azure) #Azure #cloud #organization A required grouping tag for all of the Azure services. It helps in organizing the resources.
Azure SQL Database #cloud #Azure #databases Azure SQL Database is a PaaS deployment option of Azure SQL that abstracts both the OS and the SQL Server instance provided by Azure.

Subscriptions #Azure #cloud An Azure subscription is a logical container used to provision resources in Azure. It holds the details of all your resources like virtual machines (VMs), databases, and more.
VM (Virtual Macines) #Azure #cloud #compute It is a simple compute service provided by Azure to host VMs in a VNET.
VNET (Virtual Network) #Azure #cloud An Azure Virtual Network (VNet) is a network or environment that can be used to run VMs and applications in the cloud.

Cloud Networking #cloud #networking Cloud computing has changed what we know about software design and the role/functions of data centers. The journey to the cloud begins with choosing a cloud provider and provisioning private networks or extending their on-premise network.
Cloud Providers #cloud #servers #vendors Cloud is basically someone else’s computer. This practice abstracts away the heavy configuration required to support the traditional

item.title: AWS
item.description: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is one of the comprehensive, AWS services can offer an organization tools such as compute power, database storage and content delivery services.

item.title: Azure
item.description: Azure Geographies: US Azure Government US Canada Brazil Mexico 58 Regions available across 140 Countries Pared Regions Each region is pared with another region 300 miles away.
